title: Malphite Gameplay Bug or am I wrong?
body:
In an aram match about 15 minutes ago I ulted with Malphite (Unstoppable Force) onto a vayne and someone else.  At the same time when I was halfway through my travel vayne used her E skill and knocked me back.  Not very unstoppable if you ask me.  Just wondering if that is supposed to happen or not?  Cos I most definately used my ult as it went on C/D.  

Cheers
